name: (C) 90.1-2022 Windows
_description: Commercial window assembly that meets the ASHRAE performance standard in 2022

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Based on the ASHRAE to AIA climate zone conversions here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XdnJQ5ujLBfvRvkJ117dxpMlLdbBCzYSMQ:Z7HK0:ec/edit#gid=1968005613

source_data.title: ANSI/ASHRAE/IES Standard 90.1-2022: Table 5.5:1 through Table 5.5:8 for fixed vertical fenestration
source_data.author: ASHRAE

installed_cost_source.notes: Assume baseline fenestration cost from Scout data

source_data.title: Scout Baseline Envelope Characteristics Database
source_data.author: U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, Building Technologies Office

product_lifetime_source.notes: Assumes midpoint of lifetime for aluminum and wood window assemblies

source_data.title: Study of the Life Expectancy of Home Component
source_data.author: National Association of Homebuilders
